top.parak.kraft.core.node

类 ReplicatingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.node.ReplicatingState

  • public class ReplicatingState
extends Object
    Replicating State.

    In order to track the replication progress of each follower, the leader needs to record the index of the next log entry to be replicated which is defined as nextIndex and the index of the matched logs which is defined as matchIndex.

    In the entire log replication process, the leader's commitIndex is determined by the follower's #matchIndex. Among the matchIndex of all followers, more than half of the matchIndex will become leader's new commitIndex.

    从以下版本开始:
    2022-03-19
    作者:
    KHighness
